Summary: 6 bright lights in formation silently and slowly passed over Melbourne, FL.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was eating a McDonalds and noticed everyone pointing West and I saw these 6 lights moving across the sky - low and silent, in formation until one varied the others. I have it on my camera phone - but, in the moment it is filmed upside down and when I got out of the car I just left the phone and didn't think of it. Everyone outside was quiet and watching mostly. I was amazed, I have never seen anything like this. I never saw anything on TV or news about it. I was astonished and the people had gathered to watch it. We are not far from Cape Canaveral. It was viewable for about 7 minutes, it was silent and moved slowly.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Melbourne
There were no other sightings in Melbourne on or around April 1st 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
